title: Statoil corporate fonts
content:
Anyone know what fonts they've used?

[http://sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no//getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Id...](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234424/http:/sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no/getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Identity/statoil-stationary-0.jpg "http://sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no//getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Identity/statoil-stationary-0.jpg")  
 [http://sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no//getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Id...](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234424/http:/sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no/getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Identity/statoil-stationary-2.jpg "http://sdg.no.demo.coretrek.no//getfile.php/Images/Our%20work/Statoil/Identity/statoil-stationary-2.jpg")
author: thedash

comments.content: Looks like Statoil uses its own versions of [Etelka](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234424/http:/typophile.com/node/37740) by F. Storm.
